languages.text: В сердце руин обнаружились остатки шаттла имперского происхождения, внутри — сильно поврежденный скелет пилота. Все указывает на то, что шаттл протаранил строение и вызвал пожар, уничтоживший его.

The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.
languages.original_text: В сердце руин обнаружились остатки шаттла имперского происхождения, внутри — сильно поврежденный скелет пилота. Все указывает на то, что шаттл протаранил строение и вызвал пожар, уничтоживший его.

traits.locale_text: A burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle is found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. Looks like the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

A burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle is found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. Looks like the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle is found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

languages.text: 在废墟的中心地带，船员们发现了一架帝国穿梭机被烧焦的外壳。飞行员的遗体遭到严重毁坏。看起来，这艘穿梭机全速撞上了这座建筑，引发了一场大火，最终整艘穿梭机都被烧毁殆尽。
languages.original_text: The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

traits.locale_text: 在废墟的中心地带，船员们发现了一架帝国穿梭机被烧焦的外壳。飞行员的遗体遭到严重毁坏。看起来，这艘穿梭机全速撞上了这座建筑，引发了一场大火，最终整艘穿梭机都被烧毁殆尽。

languages.text: Se han localizado los restos incinerados de una lanzadera imperial en el mismo centro de las ruinas. El cuerpo del piloto es casi irreconocible. Parece que la lanzadera se estrelló contra las ruinas a toda velocidad, causando el incendio que las arrasó.
languages.original_text: The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

traits.locale_text: Se han localizado los restos incinerados de una lanzadera imperial en el mismo centro de las ruinas. El cuerpo del piloto es casi irreconocible. Parece que la lanzadera se estrelló contra las ruinas a toda velocidad, causando el incendio que las arrasó.

languages.text: 荒れ地の中心で焼けた帝国軍のシャトルが発見された。パイロットの遺体はひどく損傷している。シャトルは全速力で建物に激突して火災を引き起こし、すべてが破壊されたようだ。
languages.original_text: The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

traits.locale_text: 荒れ地の中心で焼けた帝国軍のシャトルが発見された。パイロットの遺体はひどく損傷している。シャトルは全速力で建物に激突して火災を引き起こし、すべてが破壊されたようだ。

languages.text: Die ausgebrannte Hülle eines imperialen Shuttles wurde im Herzen der Ruinen entdeckt. Die Überreste des Piloten sind schlimm zugerichtet. Offenbar ist das Shuttle mit vollem Tempo in das Gebäude gekracht und daraufhin ausgebrannt.
languages.original_text: The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

traits.locale_text: Die ausgebrannte Hülle eines imperialen Shuttles wurde im Herzen der Ruinen entdeckt. Die Überreste des Piloten sind schlimm zugerichtet. Offenbar ist das Shuttle mit vollem Tempo in das Gebäude gekracht und daraufhin ausgebrannt.

languages.text: L'épave brûlée d'une navette impériale a été trouvée au cœur des ruines. Les restes du pilote sont très endommagés. Il semblerait que la navette ait percuté le bâtiment à pleine vitesse, provoquant l'incendie qui l'a détruit.
languages.original_text: The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.

traits.locale_text: L'épave brûlée d'une navette impériale a été trouvée au cœur des ruines. Les restes du pilote sont très endommagés. Il semblerait que la navette ait percuté le bâtiment à pleine vitesse, provoquant l'incendie qui l'a détruit.

languages.text: Harabelerin göbeğinde bir İmparatorluk mekiğinin yanmış kalıntısı bulundu. Pilotun naaşı fena hasar almış. Anlaşılan mekik olanca hızıyla binaya çarpıp yangın çıkararak harap olmuş.
languages.original_text: The burnt husk of an Imperial shuttle has been found in the heart of the ruins. The pilot's remains are badly damaged. It would seem the shuttle smashed into the building at full speed, causing the fire that destroyed it.
